relatedAITools.heading: Related AI Tools
relatedAITools.description: Discover more powerful AI tools for video creation

items.question: What video formats can I use with the Video Joiner?
items.answer: You can upload various formats including MP4, MOV, and AVI. Our platform supports standard resolutions and maintains quality during merging.

items.question: Are there limits on video length or size when joining?
items.answer: There are no strict limits, but for optimal performance, we recommend clips under 10 minutes and 2GB in size for smooth processing.

items.question: Can I add background music to my merged videos?
items.answer: Yes! You can upload audio tracks or choose from our library of royalty-free music to enhance your videos.

items.question: Is it possible to edit the videos after joining them?
items.answer: Currently, the Video Joiner focuses on merging. For edits, you can use our editing tool after merging your clips.

items.question: How fast is the video joining process?
items.answer: Joining videos typically takes just a few minutes, depending on the length and complexity of the videos being merged.

items.question: Do I retain ownership of the video content I create?
items.answer: Absolutely! All videos created with our Video Joiner are yours to use, share, and monetize without copyright issues.

items.question: Can I join videos from different sources?
items.answer: Yes, you can upload videos from various sources, including your device, cloud storage, and more for easy compilation.

items.question: What kind of support is available if I encounter issues?
items.answer: Our support team is available via chat and email. We also provide guides, FAQs, and a user community for additional help.
